version_description: Bugfixes.
Subscription trials, localisation update and lots of bug fixes.
Crash fix and localisations.
Localisation update, crash fixes.
Subscription update an bugfix.
Bug fixes.

我們做了一些大幅度的改變讓 Hornet 走向未來。正在找像你一樣喜歡名人八卦的使用者嗎？想要知道在任何城市中最棒的那間同志舞蹈俱樂部？ Hornet 把這些資訊都放到你的口袋裡了。Hornet 4.0 現在具備 Hornet 新聞功能，是世界上規模最大的 LGBT 新聞中心，新聞特報，流行文化，以及任何你需要知道，包括藝術、娛樂、旅遊、科技、健康生活和更多類型的新聞。當你開啟 Hornet 後，你會找到像你一樣有熱情、有興趣的同性戀、雙性戀，或單純只是好奇的男人。嶄新的 Hornet 地點是旅遊資訊集中站，帶給你 LGBT 活動、地點、酒吧、餐廳和旅館資訊。

第一個完整整合了 Hornet 新聞的同志交友軟體，世界上規模最大的 LGBT 新聞中心，以及 Hornet 地點，全球同志活動、同志酒吧以及旅遊資訊。這些功能取代了 Unicorn Booty ， Vespa online 以及應用程式內購買功能。

Bug fixes

We’ve made some big changes to take Hornet into the future. Looking for a guy who loves celebrity gossip as much as you do? Want to know the best gay dance club in any city? Hornet puts all this information in your pocket. Hornet version 4.0 now features Hornet Stories, the largest LGBT newsroom in the world featuring breaking news, pop culture, and everything you need to know about the arts, entertainment, travel, tech, healthy living, and more. When you open Hornet you’ll find gay, bi, or curious men who share the same passions and interests as you. The new Hornet Places is a travel and destination hub for LGBT events, places, bars, restaurants, and hotels.

A first for a gay app fully integrating Hornet Stories, the largest LGBT newsroom in the world, and Hornet Places, a worldwide destination hub for gay events, bars, and travel. Those features replace Unicorn Booty and Vespa online and in-app.
Analytics update, performance improvements.

- Hornet is now fully optimized for iOS 11
- Bug fixes

Introducing new search with quick links and previews to new guys in your area and guys who checked you out -- we know you want to see who’s interested! This update also comes with a number of stability fixes so app freezing should likely be less of an issue.

version_description: Introducing new search with quick links and previews to new guys in your area and guys who checked you out -- we know you want to see who’s interested! This update also comes with a number of stability fixes so app freezing should likely be less of an issue.

Yes we heard you, if you were confused whether your guy was online or not -- sorry about it -- be confused no longer. We fixed that bug!
- additional bug fixes

Your privacy and access to data is important to us. In our latest version of Hornet you can now go into settings to request a copy of your personal data directly from us. You can also directly opt in and out of our newsletters. Oh, and, yes, of course we fixed a number of bugs and crashes, too.

Your privacy and access to data are important to us. In our latest version of Hornet you can now request a copy of your personal data directly from us in settings. You can also directly opt in and out of our newsletters. Oh, and, yes, of course we fixed a number of bugs and crashes, too.
Our beautiful chat has never been better with a new look. Check it out!
Our beautiful chat has never been better with a new look. Check it out!
Our beautiful chat has never been better with a new look. Check it out!
Now you can send multiple photos at once in chat. Oh and we fixed some bugs!
Fix all the bugs!
Try our new stories update, zoom in on profile pictures, and add interest tags to your profile!
Express yourself with captions on your feed posts! Get creative and share your thoughts on your Hornet feed.
Private photo and location sharing simplified in chat. Plus bug fixes.
Bug fixes
Yes now you can delete or mark as read multiple chats! Plus check out a completely new onboarding flow we made for your better experience.

We're excited to introduce Version 5 - a major update that makes it easier than ever to connect in more meaningful ways!

It all starts with the new home experience: a personalized feed bringing together content from guys you follow and in your local area, influential queer voices, community contributors and our award-winning editorial staff.

Next, take the conversation public with comments. Jump in and share your opinion with guys around the world on everything from trending Stories to Moments from guys you follow.

The new captions feature gives life to Moments, enabling you to paint a more complete and authentic picture of your daily life.

Finally, kick off each day with The Daily Sting, a digest of the most important headlines curated by our editorial team and delivered directly to your feed.

With V5, we're giving you more ways than ever to meet guys and make connections.
Enjoy!

(As always, we've also fixed some bugs and made performance improvements)

We're thrilled to bring you an exciting new release, just in time for the holidays!

• Introducing Read Receipts. Premium users can now see when their messages have been read in conversations.
• We know how important expressing yourself through personal moments are so we've put sharing a moment front and center in the app! Go forth and share your moments and get connected to like-minded guys around you!
• Back by popular demand: notes! Want to remember something important about a guy you connect with on Hornet? Now you can add private notes from his profile.
• We remain vigilant against spam and have included some new defense features (that we hope you never have to see) to keep the Hornet community secure.
• As always, we've made many bug fixes, performance improvements and design tweaks to make using Hornet better than ever.

Enjoy!

• As always, we've made many bug fixes, performance improvements and design tweaks to make using Hornet better than ever.

Enjoy!

We update Hornet as often as possible to make it faster and more reliable for you to connect with guys. This version includes a number of bug fixes, feature enhancements and performance improvements, such as:

- Improved overall usability on the feed
- True support for hashtags in moments
- An improved UI for premium

Thank you for being part of the Hornet community - we hope you enjoy this release, and we can't wait to bring you more exciting updates this year!

We update Hornet as often as possible to make it faster and more reliable for you to connect with guys. This version includes a number of bug fixes, feature enhancements and performance improvements, such as:
- Major improvements to the feed to make discovering content, and the guys who create it, even easier
- Guides to help new members of the Hornet community get the most out of their feed

We update Hornet as often as possible to make it faster and more reliable for you to connect with guys. This version includes a number of feature enhancements, bug fixes and performance improvements, such as:

- FaceID support to keep your app secure
- A new inbox preview in your feed
- General bug fixes, including a fix for read receipts

There's much more in this version, and we hope you enjoy using it. Thank you for being part of the Hornet community!

Happy Pride! To kick off the season, we're pleased to release the first of our exciting summer versions. This version includes new features, enhancements, bug fixes and performance improvements, such as:
- The ability to delete a chat message you sent for both you and the guy you're chatting with
- Share stories to the feed with your own captions
- General bug fixes
There's much more in this version, and we hope you enjoy using it. Thank you for being a member of Hornet!

As pride celebrations continue around the world, it's time for our next exciting release! This version includes new features, enhancements, bug fixes and performance improvements, such as:
- For the first time, enjoy video in your feed, curated for you by our team of editors
- Keep the conversation going by replying to a guy in the comments
- Fixed a pesky feed glitch where it refreshes randomly
- More general bug fixes
There's much more in this version, and we hope you enjoy using it. Thank you for being a member of Hornet!

This version includes new features, enhancements, bug fixes and performance improvements, such as:
- Share stories and videos you see in the feed with your followers, all right from the feed itself.
- Even more anti-bot security measures to ensure Hornet is safe and secure
- Pesky crash fixes
- Lots of work under the hood to help make connecting with guys around the world even easier.
- A sneak peak at some upcoming features, available only to our beta testers. Learn more at Hornet.com/community
There's much more in this version, and we hope you enjoy using it. Thank you for being a member of Hornet!

This new version contains a number of under-the-hood improvements to help us continue to fight bots and improve the overall performance of the app.
Thank you for being a member of Hornet!
We've made some behind the scenes improvements in this version. You might not be able to see any obvious changes, but these tweaks help make our app faster, safer and more reliable.

Hey guys! We're thrilled to bring you our next major version, Version 6, thats full of exciting new features to help you connect to your community and be your authentic self. Here's what's new:

• An all new, redesigned profile
The new profile on Hornet is designed to amplify the parts of ourselves we choose to share in order to help us all connect to our community, and the people who make it, in stronger and more meaningful ways than ever before. We've also added more information to profiles, like when he joined Hornet, to help you find the most genuine guys

• A streamlined and redesigned edit profile
We couldn't update profiles and not improve editing your own profile. So we've made it easier to manage your digital persona on Hornet. From improved photo management to a longer about you and new fields like location and more, all brought together with a new streamlined interface, you can say it louder, and say it prouder.

• Introducing, The Hornet Badge
A first-of-its-kind way to easily recognize the most genuine profiles on Hornet. You earn your Hornet Badge simply by doing the things you already do everyday: sharing moments of your life to your followers, discussing stories with guys from around the world, and making your profile a rich portrait of who you are. So when you see a guys profile with the Hornet Badge, you can be sure that he, too, is an authentic and active member of our community.

• A state of the art inbox
Chat is at the heart of Hornet; it’s one of the most important ways we make connections. And with such a vibrant and diverse community, our inboxes can quickly become full with all kinds of conversations from all manners of guys. It can be easy to lose track of an important conversation.

Our new inbox makes it easier to focus on the conversations that matter most. Your primary inbox is the home of your active conversations, and the chats that you’ve started. We also show new chats from guys with their Hornet Badge in your primary inbox, too. Your requests inbox is where messages from guys who want to chat with you, but who you may never have interacted with before, live. When you respond to a message in your requests inbox, it automatically jumps over to your primary so that you can keep the conversation going easily.

• An everlasting commitment to your security
As the premier social network of the gay community, and the home of authentic self expression and meaningful connection, we take safeguarding the app and all who use it extremely seriously. The new Hornet Badge is yet another dimension in our ever improving system to help keep those who would do us harm away, and make Hornet a safe space for guys in every corner of the globe.

So no matter where you are in the world, no matter the time of day, you can join in the fun and fabulousness of the gay community with peace of mind.

We continue to work hard to make Hornet the best app to connect to your community, and your feedback is a critical part in helping us shape the future of the app. If you'd like to share your thoughts or ideas with us, please email product@hornet.com, or reach out to our support team.

We hope that you love this exciting new version and all its awesome new features.

Hey guys! We're thrilled to bring you our next major version, Version 6, thats full of exciting new features to help you connect to your community and be your authentic self. Here's what's new:

• An all new, redesigned profile
The new profile on Hornet is designed to amplify the parts of ourselves we choose to share in order to help us all connect to our community, and the people who make it, in stronger and more meaningful ways than ever before. We've also added more information to profiles, like when he joined Hornet, to help you find the most genuine guys

• A streamlined and redesigned edit profile
We couldn't update profiles and not improve editing your own profile. So we've made it easier to manage your digital persona on Hornet. From improved photo management to a longer about you and new fields like location and more, all brought together with a new streamlined interface, you can say it louder, and say it prouder.

• Introducing, The Hornet Badge
A first-of-its-kind way to easily recognize the most genuine profiles on Hornet. You earn your Hornet Badge simply by doing the things you already do everyday: sharing moments of your life to your followers, discussing stories with guys from around the world, and making your profile a rich portrait of who you are. So when you see a guys profile with the Hornet Badge, you can be sure that he, too, is an authentic and active member of our community.

• A state of the art inbox
Chat is at the heart of Hornet; it’s one of the most important ways we make connections. And with such a vibrant and diverse community, our inboxes can quickly become full with all kinds of conversations from all manners of guys. It can be easy to lose track of an important conversation.

Our new inbox makes it easier to focus on the conversations that matter most. Your primary inbox is the home of your active conversations, and the chats that you’ve started. We also show new chats from guys with their Hornet Badge in your primary inbox, too. Your requests inbox is where messages from guys who want to chat with you, but who you may never have interacted with before, live. When you respond to a message in your requests inbox, it automatically jumps over to your primary so that you can keep the conversation going easily.

• An everlasting commitment to your security
As the premier social network of the gay community, and the home of authentic self expression and meaningful connection, we take safeguarding the app and all who use it extremely seriously. The new Hornet Badge is yet another dimension in our ever improving system to help keep those who would do us harm away, and make Hornet a safe space for guys in every corner of the globe.

So no matter where you are in the world, no matter the time of day, you can join in the fun and fabulousness of the gay community with peace of mind.

We continue to work hard to make Hornet the best app to connect to your community, and your feedback is a critical part in helping us shape the future of the app. If you'd like to share your thoughts or ideas with us, please email product@hornet.com, or reach out to our support team.

Hornet is unveiling our "Pride Release," in which we've included some exciting new features in time for Pride Month.
You can now add the sticker for Hornet's #PrideWorldwide campaign to your Moments, and we've expanded the collection of Pride emoji available for use in chat. A new sticky tab bar on iOS makes navigating user profiles easier than ever. And a "Who Checked You Out?" feature now allows you to see which guys have viewed your profile.
All this is in addition to fixing bugs and behind-the-scenes performance improvements. We will continue to update Hornet as often as possible to make it a faster and more reliable way for gay men to connect with the community!

Our latest release makes Hornet's Community Contributor Programs more accessible than ever!

Now, clicking a badge found on a profile leads to a new resource page with info on the program and a list of the program's nearby members, plus instructions on how to join the program.

All this in addition to fixing bugs and BTS performance improvements. We'll continue to update Hornet often to make it a faster and more reliable way to connect with the community!

In our latest release, Hornet users are able to use Honey, a new virtual in-app currency, to award exemplary posts in the feed.

Award someone by clicking on the award icon below a post in the feed, and those awards are credited to creators with Hornet Points.

Users can access Honey and Hornet Point balances from their profile, and can easily navigate to the Hornet Shop to redeem them for various perks.
This release addresses a bug affecting our Turkish users ability to access various Hornet resources.

With Hornet’s latest major release, the world’s gay social network introduces video short stories, allowing you to connect to the gay community anytime, anywhere.

In addition to posting video, users can react to videos and award their favorite content.

Also new is an option for users who prefer not to be presented in nearby searches of online profiles to be “off the grid.”

Building on the excitement of our introduction of video, we've made some great improvements to the creation experience including being able to rotate the camera while recording. We've also fixed a number of bugs to make your video watching and creation experience smoother and faster.

We hope you're enjoying the new video functionality in Hornet! This release features great new features to make creating and sharing video even easier. You can now upload a video from your gallery, flip the camera and zoom while recording, add a caption, toggle sound and much more. We hope you love it, and we can wait to see more of your amazing videos.

Our latest release makes discovering and enjoying video even easier. Now, when viewing another guys profile, if he has shared video you'll be able to watch right from his profile. We've also improved the design to make it easier to see which videos you've already watched and which are new to you. Under the hood, we've fixed bugs and improved stability to make Hornet more reliable across more devices. We hope you enjoy it!

Hornet's latest release makes it easier than ever to access the Hornet Shop, where you can redeem your points for Hornet Premium, Hornet merch and cold hard cash. Now, access the Hornet Shop directly from your profile.
We'll continue updating Hornet to make it an even more reliable way to connect with the community!

Happy New Year to our incredible community. Our first release of 2021 continues to improve video stories, with new added features and tons of bug fixes to make uploading and watching video smoother. We've also made changes to help increase video quality.
We've also done lots of under-the-hood improvements to reduce crashes, increase performance and protect against spammers.

With our newest release, we continue to improve on your video experience. The player now automatically closes if you don't have any more videos to watch, and a new visual element helps you identify what kind of video you're watching. You can add new video directly from you profile, and much more. We've also made some improvements in your inbox, allowing to mark all messages as read in both your primary and requests inboxes.
And, as always, we've made a number of improvements under the hood to reduce crashes, increase performance and protect against spammers.
We hope you enjoy this new update!

With our newest release, we continue to improve on your video experience, including helping you better identify if you're watching a video from someone you follow, or from someone nearby. You can also view videos from profiles, and we've improved that experience.
And, as always, we've made a number of improvements under the hood to reduce crashes, increase performance and protect against spammers.
We hope you enjoy this new update!

Hornet’s latest release introduces AI Music, which allows you to add music to your videos with one touch. Simply choose a genre for a custom, one-of-a-kind soundtrack adapted to your individual video, then publish!
It’s a groundbreaking industry first feature that Hornet users are sure to love.
AI Music is the latest update making Hornet your favorite way to connect with the community!

With Hornet’s newest release, we continue to improve on users’ video experience, including an improved video upload process. You can now watch your video before you publish it.
And, as always, we’ve made a number of improvements under the hood to reduce crashes, increase performance and protect against spammers.
We hope you enjoy this new update!
